note: Gaming, logic, data, doom, audiobooks.... and cats. Data Analyst by trade, otherwise fulltime loving husband to awesome wife and cat dad

fields.name: Who am I really
fields.value: Im actually just a nobody based in the uk, im a data analyst by trade with a history of web design and even theatre crew many years ago. I lead a quiet life and like it that way. Im anonymous due to my employer having strict social media policies

fields.name: Claims to fame
fields.value: Reached the finals of a national dungeons and dragons competition as a teen. Got blacklisted as an amateur dvd reviewer for being mean about piranha II
